title: DOSM: Unemployed persons dropped to 567,800 individuals in December 2023
summary: PUTRAJAYA (Feb 9): The number of unemployed persons in December 2023 dipped to 567,800 individuals (November 2023: 569,000 unemployed), with an unemployment rate of 3.3%, according to the latest Labour Force statistics from the Department of Statistics Malaysia (DOSM).
content:
PUTRAJAYA (Feb 9): The number of unemployed persons in December 2023 dipped to 567,800 individuals (November 2023: 569,000 unemployed), with an unemployment rate of 3.3%, according to the latest Labour Force statistics from the Department of Statistics Malaysia (DOSM).

Chief statistician Datuk Seri Dr Mohd Uzir Mahidin said that the December figures indicate the nation’s stable economic foundations, driven by continuous growth in economic and social activities.
